messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’ve been skiing with Pokémon since
I was just five years old.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Hunh, what...?
I repeat, hunh, what...?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The scenery doesn’t change very much
around here. Don’t go getting lost!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Oh... Did you maybe get lost again?
You should pay more attention!
